resources.string: There are four questions in this quiz.
Question One: \nYou will have to pay a fee between $25 tp $750 to register your business.
Question Two: \nWhich of the following are business structures?
Question Three: \nWhat is the 3-letter acronym for the fedral tax number that will identify your business?
Question Four: \nIt is recommended that you open bank accounts for your business that are separate from your personal accounts.
